name: OR_LOG_ANESNTXT
description: The OR_LOG_ANESNTXT table contains OR management system log anesthesia notes.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the anesthesia notes information for the log.

columns.name: ANESTHESIA_NOTES
columns.description: The anesthesia notes attached to the log.
